    • 方法详细资料

      • parse

        public static ITool parse(java.lang.String rawInput)
        to parse user input and return an instance of ITool for execution
        参数:
        rawInput - user command
        返回:
        ITool if user command is valid, null otherwise

      • verifyCommand

        private static boolean verifyCommand(java.lang.String cmd)
        verify user command,
        参数:
        cmd - user command
        返回:
        true if quotes are closed properly, false otherwise

      • tokenizePipeCommands

        private static java.lang.String[] tokenizePipeCommands(java.lang.String str)
        Parse inputString and returns an array of commands string if the control should be passed to PipingTool Null otherwise
        参数:
        str - the user input string
        返回:
        `null` if the control shouldn't be passed to PipingTool

      • tokenizeString

        private static java.lang.String[] tokenizeString(java.lang.String str)
        Parse inputString and array of token strings
        参数:
        str - the user input string
        返回:
        array of parsed token strings, might be empty

      • getArgumentList

        private static java.lang.String[] getArgumentList(java.lang.String[] tokens)

        private static java.lang.String getCommand(java.lang.String[] tokens)
